ResizeClusterMessage.description: Describes a resize cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `ResizeCluster` API operation.

PauseClusterMessage.description: Describes a pause cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `PauseCluster` API operation.

ResumeClusterMessage.description: Describes a resume cluster operation. For example, a scheduled action to run the `ResumeCluster` API operation.

resource.description: The `AWS::Redshift::ScheduledAction` resource creates an Amazon Redshift Scheduled Action.

properties.name: ScheduledActionName
properties.description: The name of the scheduled action. The name must be unique within an account.

type.description: The name of the scheduled action. The name must be unique within an account.

properties.name: TargetAction
properties.description: A JSON format string of the Amazon Redshift API operation with input parameters.

type.description: A JSON format string of the Amazon Redshift API operation with input parameters.

properties.name: IamRole
properties.description: The IAM role to assume to run the target action.

type.description: The IAM role to assume to run the target action.

properties.name: ScheduledActionDescription
properties.description: The description of the scheduled action.

type.description: The description of the scheduled action.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.description: The start time in UTC of the scheduled action. Before this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

type.description: The start time in UTC of the scheduled action. Before this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The end time in UTC of the scheduled action. After this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

type.description: The end time in UTC of the scheduled action. After this time, the scheduled action does not trigger.

properties.name: Enable
properties.description: If true, the schedule is enabled. If false, the scheduled action does not trigger.

type.description: If true, the schedule is enabled. If false, the scheduled action does not trigger.

attributes.description: The `AWS::Redshift::ScheduledAction` resource creates an Amazon Redshift Scheduled Action.

properties.name: State
properties.description: The state of the scheduled action.

type.description: The state of the scheduled action.

properties.name: NextInvocations
properties.description: List of times when the scheduled action will run.

type.description: List of times when the scheduled action will run.
